dt: {bc}any of a genus ({it}Maranta{/it} of the family Marantaceae, the arrowroot family) of tropical American plants with tuberous roots
{bc}one ({it}M. arundinacea{/it}) whose roots yield an easily digested edible starch
{bc}any of several plants (such as coontie) that yield starch

shortdef: any of a genus (Maranta of the family Marantaceae, the arrowroot family) of tropical American plants with tuberous roots; especially : one (M. arundinacea) whose roots yield an easily digested edible starch
any of several plants (such as coontie) that yield starch

dt: {bc}any of several tropical American woody cycads (genus {it}Zamia{/it}) whose roots and stems yield a starchy foodstuff

shortdef: any of several tropical American woody cycads (genus Zamia) whose roots and stems yield a starchy foodstuff —called also arrowroot
